name: Shapik: the quest 2
description:
Shapik the quest 2 is an atmospheric 2D-adventure/quest game.

The game is set in a mysterious world, after Earth has been destroyed by a nuclear war. You, the Player, are a humanoid creature, named Shapik, who has come out to the surface of the destroyed earth many years after the nuclear strikes took place. You are on your way to explore the world in the aftermath and meet a lot of interesting characters and creatures. You will also need to help Shapik to solve a lot of puzzles and uncover the mystery of what has caused the fallout.

Game mechanics

Point and click adventure - control the character with the mouse. Clicking, makes your character move to the specified point. The character can use objects, which are within the reach.

Website http://shapikthequest.com/
